name: EnergyNews

skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill

Developer Terms of Use
des:
As part of your Flash Briefing, Hart Energy is your go-to source for information about energy finance, capital markets, acquisition and divestitures, and exploration plays and trends. (Updates hourly)

-The most comprehensive oil and gas skill available on Amazon Alexa 
-2018 Folio: Digital Awards Finalist - New Digital Product
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
